import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Utente } from 'src/app/model/utente/utente'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home-page', templateUrl: './home-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home-page.component.css'] }) export class HomePageComponent implements OnInit{ //da spostare nell'header utente?: Utente; ngOnInit(): void { if(sessionStorage.getItem('utenteloggato')){ this.utente = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('utenteloggato')!) } } logout(): void { sessionStorage.removeItem('utenteloggato'); window.location.reload(); } }
